  • mlx.core.eval
  • View page source

mlx.core.eval

mlx.core.eval(*args, retain_graph: bool = False) → None

Evaluate an array or tree of array.

Parameters:

  • *args (arrays or trees of arrays) – Each argument can be a single array or a tree of arrays. If a tree is given the nodes can be a Python list, tuple or dict but the leafs must all be an array.

  • retain_graph (bool) – Indicate that the graph structure should be preserved. This option is intended to enable function transforms which contain control flow based on the value of an array.
